turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'm going to talk about reporting a lost item and your role is here is lost and found assistant or police officer.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! I'll take on the role of a lost and found assistant. Just let me know what item you've lost, and we'll get started!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I have just realized I lost my phone. I am at the train station and I would like to check with the lost and found desk.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that! Let's get that sorted out. Could you tell me the time you last had your phone and any specific details about it?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “It was in the morning time when I went to my office. At that time, I lost my phone at the train station. So, and I knew only about after one hour when I lost my phone.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, thanks for the details. I’ll make a note that you lost it during the morning rush and it was about an hour ago. Could you describe the phone, like its color or model, so we can identify it quickly?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “The phone has a red case and cracked screen.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, so a red phone with a cracked screen. Got it! I’ll pass that information along to the lost and found team at the station. Hopefully, they’ll have it for you soon!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I last saw it at the train station around 9 a.m. in the morning, and when I went to office, then I didn't have that mobile.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you for that detail! I'll let the team know that you last saw it around 9 a.m. at the station. Hopefully, they’ll have it in their lost and found. I’ll keep you updated as soon as I hear back!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “What happens if someone finds it?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: If someone finds it, they’ll turn it in to the station's lost and found, and you'll be notified so you can pick it up. We'll do our best to make sure it gets back to you as soon as possible!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I leave my contact details?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! If you could share your contact details, we'll make sure to reach out to you as soon as your phone is found.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do I need to fill out a form?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, we do have a simple form for you to fill out with your contact details and a description of the item. I can guide you through it, and then we’ll keep you updated as soon as we have any news!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do I need to show ID when collecting it?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, typically you will need to show a valid ID when you pick it up, just to confirm your identity. But don’t worry, we’ll make the process as smooth as possible for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can you call me if it's found?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We'll give you a call as soon as we have any news about your phone. That way, you’ll know right away.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Should I file an official police report for this?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It’s usually a good idea to file a report if your phone isn’t found quickly, just to have an official record. I can help you with that process if you'd like!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there any lost property website I can check?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, we do have a lost property website where you can check for any items that have been turned in. I can provide you with the link so you can keep an eye on it as well!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thanks for explaining everything.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help. If you have any other questions, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “ہماری مدد کرنے کے لئے احساس کرتے ہیں”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I’m so glad to hear that! Feel free to reach out anytime you need assistance. Have a wonderful day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! Take care and have a great day!
